LanguageData.GoJuice.label: енергетик
LanguageData.GoJuice.description: Синтетичний препарат для підвищення ефективності, розроблений для космічних десантників у ранні дні міжпланетної війни. Go-juice blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities. For psycasters, the drug also instantly increases psyfocus without meditation.\n\nThe military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness. Some saw this as a downside; others saw it as a benefit.
